content: 1 YEAR EDITION MOON PASS FINE SILVER 999.9Hello everyone ! i hope you all are fine !! As you know the MOON PASS 1 YEAR EDITION was first on sale for the MOON PASS Original hodlers, the remaining MOON PASS 1 YEAR EDITION are auctioned to the public, like it was say on the 1HoDLCUB Q2 2022 Thread.Today is the auction for 5 MOON PASS 1 YEAR EDITION, the numbers: 23/50 ; 24/50; 26/50 ; 33/50 ; 44/50 , 4 others may be auctioned next week, awaiting confirmation.Exactly the same size as the MOON PASS and 85 x 54 mm and 1.3mm but this time 65g of Fine Silver! Like its predecessor there is only 50 editions! On the front we can find the design of the MOON PASS with the serial numbers at the top left and the denomination on the top right. further down we can find the 1HoDLCLUB stamp with the indication of the weight and the material.Due to the special format and thickness of the card used to make this Fine silver 999.9 card, the cards may have minor flaws on the edges, but nothing serious.on the back we can find the same hologram as there was on the original MOON PASS, in its window we see the QR code of the BTC public key and below the private key!, for this edition all the BTC public keys begin with "1Moon... " and each MOON PASS is loaded with 0.0021 BTC.the auction begins at the initial sale price. selling price at the hodler.Good luck to everyone !  1 YEAR EDITION MOON PASS Fine Silver 999.9Mintage : 50 [5 auctionned here]Material : 999.9 Fine SilverSize : 85x54mmThickness : 1.3mmWeight : 65grDenomination : 0.0021BTC Serial auctionned today:  ; 23/50 ; 24/50 ; 26/50 ; 33/50 ; 44/50 Starting Bid : (the bidding don't include the loading)Each lot bears the serial number of the MOON PASS at auctionLot#23 : 0.012BTCLot#24 : 0.012BTCLot#26 : 0.012BTCLot#33 : 0.012BTCLot#44 : 0.012BTCMinimum Bid Increments: 0.0001BTCLoading : the loading amount of 0.0021 BTC are not included in the bidding,it should be added to this one at the end of the auction during the payments!BTC Payment AdressBTC [Legacy] :1M5LwdwAFN5WJVczHTrLMpwzoiZ678b1RYBTC [Segwit] :bc1q9jl9jtgh6ld5mw63twpwnf3v222re3all6s7ngAuction Ends: May 29, 2022 @ 9pm UTCCountdown:MOON PASS 1 YEAR EDITION COUNTDOWNSniping:  No sniping, each bid in the final 15 minutes adds 15 minutes until no bid has been made for 15 minutesShipping: 16$ [Priority + Tracking] Reference list :Code:Serial           BTC Address23     1MoonxYr7v2hZHvaE2RJfwcoDZztNgMrDh24     1Moonxn2MiUJ2mqq2A55fygLtGQgF69jJk26     1MoonxP6d4SCpPkd7f8V8z6VsowMjrpZT233     1MoonxMoqXABNWVnjYnEZua7ReDcRBwZEZ44     1MoonxNka1uqiRkDEhbFdFBtobWB1iDw6o1HoDLCLUB : https://1hodlclub.store Gonne ba rebuild from the scratch !Twitter : https://twitter.com/MrCryptHODL Follow me
